title: Winter Snow with Red Poinsettias Christmas Holiday Thank You Sticker Labels, 40 2" Party Circle Stickers by AmandaCreation, Great for Party Favors, Envelope Seals & Goodie Bags
features: Cuteness Overload: Designed by a talented mom, these festive stickers feature gorgeous red poinsettias with winter greenery – all on a snowy wood plank-looking background. Perfect for your Christmas get togethers! Amanda Creation. Original design by Amanda Creation

Awesome Quality: Forget smaller, chintzier labels printed on flimsy paper. At 2 inches your Merry Christmas Stickers are bigger & sturdier than most. Plus, they're printed on 60# stock for ultra quality.

2 inch circle labels are perfect for a variety of uses. You’ll get 40 stickers so there’s plenty to give out to everyone who attends the party. Stick them on goodie bags, party favors, boxes, tags or you can even use them as envelope seals on your thank you cards.

These fun stickers help you coordinate all of the little details for your celebration. Matching invitations and thank you cards are available as well, be sure to get all the matching pieces for a truly beautiful event.

100% Made in the USA: Rest assured you're getting genuine American craftsmanship... from the expert design to the premium stickers to the full-color printing. 100% Money Back Guarantee, your purchase is Risk Free!
description: *** Bigger... Better... and Best of All... Cuter. Presenting December Holiday Party Sticker Labels Designed by a Mom for Moms. Set of 40 Party Circle Stickers (2" Each) ***

*Perfect to use as envelope seals on your matching thank you cards *Larger 2 " size for bigger visual impact (most others are only 1"-1.5”) *Heftier 60# cardstock with a smooth slightly gloss finish (so it's shiny)
Great for sticking on party favors, goodie bags, boxes or even tags
